ygData.subject: Re: Goodbye Friends, I'll Never Forget ANY Of You!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Cya around, Dcoburn! I ll take good care of the Lavacons for ya. ... leave is temporary.  I may come back one day.    One day.  Good bye all, I ll never forget

Cya around, Dcoburn! I'll take good care of the Lavacons for ya.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
>    Like Minime, I am leaving too.  But, I'm not so sure that this 
leave is temporary.  I may come back one day.    One day.  Good bye 
all, I'll never forget any single one of you.  
> 
>       Until then, my chars go out to:
> 
>    Necromancer: Cyberwolf
>    Hell Drak: Lilli(Logomorph)
>    Wheeljack: Alloran
>    Skulletron: Jason Lind
>    Sickle: Shomin [*Note 1*]
>    Lavacons: Yanshosh [*Note 2*]
>    Elements Force: Shomin[*Note 3*]
>    Dollen: Roborick
>    Decadel: JP3884
>    Hakibuscon: Dachande
> (If I missed any other of my chars, then they are up for grabs)
> 
> *Note 1=Sickle is just a floating seethrough entity, and he can 
change his shape, but when he changes his shape, he is just still his 
entity self, but he is not just a floating whatever, also, Sickle may 
come in handy with Child's story or something, since he is not a 
transformer, and he comes from the Abyss
> 
> *Note 2=The Lavacons at anytime can transform into a different form 
of themselves e.g. Dark Lavacons, Fire Lavacons, Water Lavacons, Bomb 
Lavacons, Ground Lavacons, or whatever
> 
> *Note 3=The Elements can change into different elements, like the 
Lavacons, excpet they aint transformers.  And they can control things 
and stuff with their element type so if they are plant element, they 
can make trees grow and stuff they also may come in handy with 
Child's story, they come from the Dimension of Elements
